title: Ticket #7416: userMap returns unexpected type
description: The userMap documentation says that it returns a user's groups as a list (https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/stable/misc-concepts/classad-mechanism.html#index-72) but appears to return all of the groups as a string. I'm not sure if the intended behavior is what we're getting or what the doc describes but we should make sure they match.
remarks:
2019-Dec-05 13:31:37 by tannenba:
This may be a case of just updating the documentation to say it returns a stringList (if that is whats happening...)

2019-Dec-05 14:30:09 by johnkn:
Yes it returns a string list. Note that it doesn't say it returns a classad list. I'll add the word string to the docs.
check_ins: 2019-Dec-05 14:30   Check-in [58599]: Clarify that userMap always returns a string or undefined, even the 2 argument form. #7416 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: blin
